title: Integrated Design of Educational Leadership Beliefs and Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education curriculum and understanding of fundamental instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Delivers blended learning experiences utilizing VR simulations in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the transmissive and constructive approaches to educational leadership beliefs.
Learners can apply appropriate leadership strategies to blended instructional design in a simulated environment.
Learners can analyze the practical impact of educational leadership beliefs through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
